verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David.) The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>" They are <S%H7843>corrupt,<s%> they have <S%H8581>committed<s%> <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5949>deeds;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> To <S%H7200>see<s%> if <S%H3426>there<s%> are <S%H3426>any<s%> who <S%H7919>understand,<s%> Who <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H430>God.<s%>

They have <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside;<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> they have <S%H444>become<s%> <S%H444>corrupt;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> not <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

Do <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>wickedness<s%> not <S%H3045>know,<s%> Who <S%H398>eat<s%> up my <S%H5971>people<s%> [as] they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> [And] do not <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?
<S%H8033>There<s%> they are in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6342>dread,<s%> For <S%H430>God<s%> is with the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
You would <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>

<S%H4310>Oh,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would come out of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>restores<s%> His <S%H7622>captive<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
